website_summaries.verdict: A trusted running brand created an underwear that's comfortable for both casual and competitive runners.
pros: Wicks away sweat and maintains form where it should
Fits well on most body shapes, regardless of one's training regime
Long distance runners favor this garment over others
Competitively priced for such a highly regarded name in running
cons: While we love the soft fabric, it does have  tendency to ride up while running

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were recommended to prevent chafing (chub rub) on my inner thighs and man parts. They work better than cotton boxer briefs that I have used, but after a full day of walking/hiking I was starting to get uncomfortable. I also tried out Fruit of the Loom "Breathable Lightweight Micro-Mesh" that were significantly cheaper, and in my opinion worked MUCH better to prevent chafing. Again, the New Balance worked better than most underpants I have tried, but if you are a chubby guy looking to relieve the burn I would recommend the above mentioned Fruit of the Loom tag free boxer briefs with Ultra Flex Technology. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: MrMono

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set i have bought and i am displeased with the fitment as i thought maybe it was just me but no the chart is off. I have purchased spyder, adidas and rebook and the larges fit fine until i got these and wow they feel like mediums. These were mad in china and made for asian people with this size chart. No more new balance. back to adidas or reebok for me
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the 2-pack with great quality and function.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the 2-pack, and great quality. Likes: the smooth seams (don't irritate), the wide waist band (doesn't cut or bind), the fabric structure (stays in place but gives flexibility and doesn't roll up), the breatheability of fabric, the moisture control (dries quick and keeps me drier), the length (doesn't show below shorts, but long enough to feel firmly in place), the design (it has to look nice, right?). As far as size, I am technically in between M and L, but the L fits me great, so don't be afraid to go a little large.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good. Impressed as can be.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable. Ordered a pair of these to compare with the Adidas version and found these to be far superior, unless you are looking for the super-compression feature of the Adidas. These are similar to Equipo brand but even better. Waist band is nice and wide, causing no discomfort and doesn’t fold over like many thinner waistbands. A+ product. Will order more colors soon if the pricing stays between $16-20 for two. Price fluctuates, but well worth it when they are priced right. My new favorite underwear for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Tape over package holes transfers adhesive onto the shorts
customer_reviews.text: I have several sets of these in different colors and love them for comfort and performance. But this is the first time I've ordered in a while and they arrived with some sort of tape over the holes in the product packaging (the holes normally allow a retail shopper to see the actual colors without opening the item). Unfortunately the adhesive from the tape transferred onto the briefs. I asked for a replacement sent and experienced the exact same problem.
customer_reviews.author: BubbaChris

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, but part of the reason I picked these was because I thought they had "Flat seems" turns out there is a seem running right down the dead center of the fly, on the outer and inner flaps, so it does rub in the not so nicest way, but you can adjust yourself to make them more comfortable. Maybe after a few washes it will get better? enlarge the pic and look at the fly before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: They run very small i had to return them
customer_reviews.text: Can't really leave a good review since I am returning the 4 pairs I bought since they are very small. I could tell from just looking at them that they run small so I am returning them. I tried to cancel my order before it shipped because I read the comments and a ton of them said that the boxer briefs run very small but it would not let me cancel my order so now I have to return them so just watch because these shorts run very small.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Best Active Men's Boxer Briefs on the Market
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite boxer briefs to wear for working out or running. The fit is perfect and these never ride up. They also seem to stay much cooler than others. Perhaps due to using a superior material than some similar products I've tried out like the Adidas Clima Cool boxer briefs. Additionally, they're well made and hold up very well as I've been buying these from New Balance for a few years now. I wouldn't normally care to write a review of men's underwear, but if you're looking for something to wear to workout, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Borgmann

customer_reviews.title: Good shorts, but I don't love the bright yellow
customer_reviews.text: This is a snug compression fit. The M size fits me fine (5'7", 160, athletic, with 31" waist). So far they have held up well to washing. I don't love the color scheme and would rather they both be mainly grey than having one mostly grey and the other mostly fluorescent yellow, but that's the style they've chosen. The 2-pack is definitely a good value though, so I went with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed BTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: these are great. i cant say enough. i love these, cotton boxers or for cavemen and children. step up your game and get something like these. i have 4 pair and wash em as i shower and hang dry them in the bathroom. get rid of your stupid cotton underweardrawer
customer_reviews.author: S D

customer_reviews.title: better than cotton
customer_reviews.text: my first jump into more athletic (and spendy) boxers. better than cotton, still kinda heavy, but not bulky. didnt help with chaffing. annoying wash guidelines, im following them now but will eventually wash in the machine with everything else. they are comfy and stay put, dont ride and feel great under tighter pants
customer_reviews.author: S D

customer_reviews.title: Not good elastic on waistband
customer_reviews.text: The elastic waistband on both pairs that I bought have lost their stretch. As you can see from the photo it has "buckled" and now they don't want to stay up securely and aren't comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, snug but not restrictive.
customer_reviews.text: Lucky me, I lost some weight and arm now no longer an extra large. It's hot here in Louisiana and I need underwear that breathes. This is the best I've ever found. Now have a complete set. Better than UA or any of the others.
customer_reviews.author: TUGBOAT-AK

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting room ever.
customer_reviews.text: My son says these are, “EPIC!” The best, most well fitting and comfortable underwear he has ever worn. He wore them on a two week Rocky Mountain backpacking & Rick climbing expedition, so they were definitely tested.

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: they hold up, will definitely buy again. got a deal on three of another type leg elastic already gone out. bought these before those and still good and they dry quicker than any other I own which is something I look for in these types of underwear.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Best protection against swamp butt ever! Freak for working out and general purpose, I wear them every day for work at a machine shop and ive never been more comfortable. I've bought a couple pairs and I'll buy more!

customer_reviews.title: Great underwear!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Changed my life when it comes to having soaked underwear on a hot summer day. They still get wet but it’s not uncomfortable as it was before when I had cotton boxer briefs. Would definitely buy more of these!

customer_reviews.text: So many manufacturers and everyone’s XL is different so u just have to keep trying to find the ones that fit u properly. These run small on me but Adidas brand fit fine.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, perfect fit, look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, great fit! Fabric is cool and most of all, my wife loves the way they look and fit on me! They fit true to size. Buy these, you will not be disappointed!

I try to take care of them by not drying them completely, but I did that with the others as well. These fit well, hold their shape, and are very comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: These have changed my life......may seem extreme but during this heat wave in the north east, they really have.

customer_reviews.text: I will walk, jog, run, sprint 4-5 miles while refereeing a soccer game. These work great. While the standard variety colors are nice the camo prints really set the tone.

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit—ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit and the "legs" of the brief tend to ride up, giving the feeling of "knickers in a twist," as the British say. I usually take a size 31 waist and was afraid the medium would be too large, but in fact they fit more like a snug size 30. Likely to draw eyes in the locker room if that's what you're after. Otherwise, no complaints.

product_meta.title: New Balance Mens Dry Fresh Boxer Brief 2-Pack
product_meta.description: The NB Dry NB Fresh 6 inch boxer brief (2-pack) is engineered with comfort and performance in mind. The unique 4-way stretch fabric blend allows for total freedom of movement while taking moisture away from the skin quickly for fast drying. Ideal for a wide range of activities, the advanced construction utilizes minimal seams, an articulated mesh gusset and fly opening to make you comfortable all the way around, day in and day out. The soft ergonomic waistband fits right and the antimicrobial properties resist odors. Using our nb dry and nb fresh technology this performance underwear two pack is your new go-to for any sport.No side seams for easy layering
feature_bullets: Ultimate Comfort: Made from 87% polyester and 13% spandex, these briefs are tagless and breathable, providing you with the ultimate comfort. A lightweight 4-way stretch supports your every move.

Features: A quick wicking design and mesh gusset moves sweat away from your body which will keep you cool and dry. They are perfect for working out, running, skiing, skateboarding, football, baseball, basketball, tennis, volleyball, soccer, and hiking.
Superior Design: These boxers feature an elastic waistband for added flex. These briefs also feature a “no-ride” inseam. You will not have to deal with uncomfortable bunching or irritation.
How to Wash: Washer and dryer safe! Machine wash cold with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Do not iron.No side seams for easy layering
What’s Included: 2 New Balance Men's Dry Fresh 6 Inch Boxer Brief's. The sizes are available in Small (29-31 Inches), Medium (32-34 Inches), Large (36-38 Inches), & X-Large (40-42 Inches)
